aboutSectionDescription: Meet the passionate professionals who drive our commitment to excellence, innovation, and community impact.

team.name: Dr. Wilmar Pereira dos Santos
team.bio: Lawyer with over 30 years of experience and a postgraduate degree in Civil Procedural Law. Specialist in Administrative Law and strategic legal consulting—public, procedural, and environmental. Former Chief Prosecutor for Planning and Environment at the Municipality of Búzios.

team.name: Raphael Souza Fonseca
team.bio: Economist and entrepreneur with a track record at Ipiranga S/A, Grupo Abril, Mongeral Aegon, and Banco de Arbi. For the past 12 years, he has focused on real estate entrepreneurship.

team.name: Giovanna Guida da Cunha
team.bio: Architect experienced in major events such as Rock in Rio, The Town, Dinosaur Park, and Bird Park. Currently leading the architecture for the UN Climate Conference (COP) project in Belém, Pará.

team.name: Daniel Machado Magalhães de Almeida
team.bio: Advertising professional and gastronomy entrepreneur with 21 years of experience in events, food, and culture. Led venues such as Aqua Bossa Lounge, Grupo Rayz, People, and Devassa, and was appointed Secretary of our association.
